projectDesc

projectDescproject description describes in detail the aim or purpose for which an electronic file was encoded, together with any other relevant information concerning the process by which it was assembled or collected. [2.3.1 The Project Description 2.3 The Encoding Description 15.3.2 Declarable Elements ]
